summary: Conversations with death row inmate Michael Perry and those affected by his crime serve as an examination of why people - and the state - kill.
cast: Werner Herzog|Richard Lopez|Michael Perry|Damon Hall|Lisa Stolter-Balloun|Charles Richardson|Jason Burkett|Jared Talbert|Amanda West|Delbert Burkett|Melyssa Thompson-Burkett|Fred Allen
title: Into the Abyss
